description: vol. 2 (Kitāb al-ḥajj through Kitāb al-Nikāḥ). ff. 238. 260 x 175; 175 x 155 mm. 17 lin. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 744, Muḥammad ibn ḥasan al-Fayyūmī. Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 670 (IX: Kitāb Khilāf al-Shāfiʻī...). Incip. (fol. 1 damaged): کتاب الحج ... لا ىحبط الحج [...] وقال ابو حنىفة ىحبط
author: Fīrūzābādī al-Shīrāzī, Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf, ca. 1003-1083
title: al-Nukat fī masāʼil al-khilāf bayna al-Shāfiʻīyah wa-al-ḥanafīyah
creator: Fīrūzābādī al-Shīrāzī, Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Yūsuf, ca. 1003-1083
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
